description: This file initializes and renders the React application's root component into the DOM. It imports necessary dependencies including React, ReactDOM, CSS styles, and the main App component, then attaches the App component to the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to render a React component tree, used for React 18+ concurrent features.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the root DOM node.
